features: 【WHY CHOOSE】The portable neck fan can truly free your hands, and enjoy the cool wind anytime, anywhere . Best friend for work, office, reading, sports, travel, hiking, cycling, etc. It is also a good choice as gifts for family and friends.

【With Adjustable Lanyard】The personal neck fan with adjustable lanyard, can hang on the neck , hands free and easy to adjust the length. The mini fan also designed with bracket, so can put on the tabletop, also convenient hang on the waist if need. Let you enjoy the cool and stylish.
【Wide angle air outlet】The new design portable neck fan, large angle of air supply, the wind can be blown far and near.

【USB Rechargeable & 3 Speed Wind】USB rechargeable neck fan, convenient to charge via computer, cell phone charger, power bank, laptops etc. Built-in 2000 mah battery, provide 3 to 7 hours duration (depend on different speeds). 3 wind speeds can be adjusted at will to meet any needs of you.

【Low Noise Design & Comfortable】The wearable personal fan’s motor has been modified so that will produce lower noise during operation. Made of Eco-friendly ABS, makes the neck fan more durable and quieter. You can have a quiet environment, even if you wear a neck fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bye Hot Snaps
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best fans I’ve purchased. The 3 speeds work great. Easy to drop in my purse and carry. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was priceless to have with me!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these fans to bring with me to a hot, humid destination I was going to for 11 days. I was so glad I did! I was able to put the fan around my neck on speed 1 most of the time and that was enough to help me tolerate the heat and humidity. It was not overly heavy around my neck and the charge lasted a decent amount of time. It did not take overly long to recharge. The only negative thing is you need to use the cable that came with it to charge it; we tried other cables we already had with us and they did not work. I was very happy with the performance of this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Last a long time
reviews.reviewText: Took this to Disney and it has 3 speeds. We spent about 8 hours at Disney and it lasted the whole time there.It’s easy to use, not super loud like some other fans, it does keep you cool but you have to move it around you seeing as it’s more of a straight shot vs a broad band kind of thingy. The straps adjustable so you can choose where to hang at plus there’s a clip. It’s easy to carry around with you and light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, well designed, highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by this little fan. I work in a south-facing room that becomes an oven in the afternoons. It stands, clips onto something, or has a neck strap that removes easily. It recharges quickly and works while it recharges, with an easy-to-read display and a light that indicates charging status. It is also nicely finished and actually pretty. The air intake is on the top, so it does not get blocked by fabric, etc. It puts out a lot of air on even the lowest setting and is quiet. I can direct it just on my neck and not my face, so it does not dry out my eyes. So glad to have this. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this tiny but powerful fan!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a lanyard fan for my recent vacation that worked for the week while I was there but once the battery died, so did the fan because it wouldn’t charge anymore. The fan I had looked like most all of the other fans you see that blow straight out. I wanted to replace the fan that quit working and came across this one. I had never seen one that blows straight up like this one does. If you are going to use it with the lanyard, this makes so much more sense! I no longer have to lift the fan up towards me, this one blows right where I want it. If you decide to use it without the lanyard, it has a stand attached to the back so you don’t have to prop it up against something. Also a really nice bonus is that it has a battery indicator so you know when it’s getting close to needing a recharge! I’m actually so glad my other fan broke or I would never have found this one. I absolutely love this little fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does the job but the battery dies quickly
reviews.reviewText: Pros- the price is reasonable, the color looks nice and vibrant in person, it’s light weight not heavy at all, and very quiet when in use.Cons- the battery life is terrible within 1 hour and 30 minutes of usage on the second setting it’s already at 57%. It takes about 2 1/2 hours to fully charge.I’ve debated about whether or not I should return it but… it technically does the job, this is just not for long term use. Other than the battery life I have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful little device
reviews.reviewText: Terrible pic, but I love this thing. This little fan is perfect for my needs. I've had it for over 2 months now, and it works great. My body temperature flip flops between frosty-bones cold and egg-sizzling-on-the-sidewalk hot frequently, so swapping the home AC around to accommodate me would be a nightmare.This summer has also been particularly painful. When I first got it, I would turn the fan on when my AC wasn't working and have it blowing right in my face. I thought the fan wasn't doing much until I turned it off and realized the raw air was hot-pepper-spicy-satan-hot. I would then turn it back on and bask in the feeling of the fan.Sometimes I have to turn it off because it makes me cold, but keep in mind that it's not a mini AC. It will not serve you Arctic Frost unless the room temperature is already slightly cool or you're anemic idk.Occasionally, I fall asleep with it on and that has given me some of the best sleep I've had in a bit. It's usually dead by the time I wake up, but the battery lasts if you're not using it on the highest setting. I rarely have to turn it higher than the second setting, though.Oh, and you can use it while it's charging. That part has been a huge lifesaver. I didn't realize it at first, but I tried it out one day when I was desperate to get away from the summer heat, and it works just the same as if it was unplugged. I've used it while charging even if it was just completely dead a second before with no issues. I wouldn't use the fan before it's charged too much, as it could mess up the device in the long run. But if you really need it, this little trick could help you out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a person who get super hot and sweaty quickly and a lot. I've been through many types a fans. But by far this is the best fan I ever bought. It was so good my manager had me send her to link to it.
Me gusto mucho, no pesa, es practico y refresca

reviews.reviewTitle: not as long lasting as stated.
reviews.reviewText: All items came as described. The only issue is it states:at level 3 battery should last at least 2.5 hours when it only lasted 1.5 hour.at level 2 battery should last at least 4.5 hours when it only lasted 2.75 hours.at level 1 battery should last at least 7 hours and it lasted almost 7 hours,

reviews.reviewTitle: Effective personal cooling device on the run!
reviews.reviewText: Light weight but heavy enough not to bounce around when moving. Blows air up towards your face - which is where I need it most. Great for on the treadmill or when dancing.
Nothing much other then a good fan and convenient
Excelentes materiales y acabado. La duración de la batería podría ser mejor.Funciona bien pero es muy pesado debido a la batería recargable que tiene.
